author: GamingBolt
description:
With Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion's final release date inching ever closer, fans of Marvelous USA's take on a mech-action title are gearing up to dive back into the adventure and customize their mechs to their heart's content before diving into the thick of things in a significantly larger world than its predecessor. 

With the studio looking to expand on the size and scope of the franchise’s first outing, things are heating up for the Outers in this new adventure, requiring that they bring their best piloting skills to the field as they attempt to navigate a new world with complex and nuanced political relationships requiring their tact and skill. To that end, let's take a look at what's new in Titanic Scion and perhaps help you decide if this one is worth your time, attention, and of course, your hard-earned cash.
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion - 14 Things You NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy

author: GamingBolt
description:
The PS5 has been around for around the same time period as the life span of many consoles before the PS3/Xbox 360 era, and this means that the console has now accrued an impressive library of single-player games. 

While the console is no slouch when it comes to multiplayer games either, the single-player offerings tend to show off the true strengths of Sony’s console. With this in mind, talking about the greatest single-player games for the console has been quite a challenge, since there are well over 60 of them out there. 

However, we ultimately came to the conclusion that a list of 60 games offers a great starting point for just about every kind of gamer out there, regardless if you like racing games, adventure titles, side-scrollers, or even high-intensity shooters.
title: 60 MUST PLAY PS5 Single Player Games - [2025 Edition]
